languages.text: "Я тут подумала... А мы точно вернулись? Это не может быть очередной пыткой Тервантьяса? Какой-нибудь извращенной грезой?"
"I've been thinking... Are we definitely back? Could this be another kind of torture cooked up by Tervantias? Some twisted dream?"
languages.original_text: "Я тут подумала... А мы точно вернулись? Это не может быть очередной пыткой Тервантьяса? Какой-нибудь извращенной грезой?"

traits.locale_text: "I've been thinking... Are we definitely back? Could this be another kind of torture cooked up by Tervantias? Some twisted dream?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我一直在想……我们真的回来了吗？这会不会是特万提亚斯编织的另一种酷刑？某种扭曲的幻梦？”
languages.original_text: "I've been thinking... Are we definitely back? Could this be another kind of torture cooked up by Tervantias? Some twisted dream?"

traits.locale_text: “我一直在想……我们真的回来了吗？这会不会是特万提亚斯编织的另一种酷刑？某种扭曲的幻梦？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je me demandais... Est-ce qu'on est vraiment de retour ? Ou est-ce que ce ne serait pas une autre torture inventée par Tervantias ? Comme, je sais pas, un rêve éveillé ? »
languages.original_text: "I've been thinking... Are we definitely back? Could this be another kind of torture cooked up by Tervantias? Some twisted dream?"

traits.locale_text: « Je me demandais... Est-ce qu'on est vraiment de retour ? Ou est-ce que ce ne serait pas une autre torture inventée par Tervantias ? Comme, je sais pas, un rêve éveillé ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «He estado pensando... ¿de verdad hemos salido? ¿O es esta otra de las torturas de Tervantias? ¿Estamos en un sueño retorcido?».
languages.original_text: "I've been thinking... Are we definitely back? Could this be another kind of torture cooked up by Tervantias? Some twisted dream?"

traits.locale_text: «He estado pensando... ¿de verdad hemos salido? ¿O es esta otra de las torturas de Tervantias? ¿Estamos en un sueño retorcido?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ずっと考えてたの…本当に戻れたのかしら？これはテルヴァンティアスが仕組んだ、新種の拷問じゃないかしら。ひねくれすぎてる夢じゃなくて？」
languages.original_text: "I've been thinking... Are we definitely back? Could this be another kind of torture cooked up by Tervantias? Some twisted dream?"

traits.locale_text: 「ずっと考えてたの…本当に戻れたのかしら？これはテルヴァンティアスが仕組んだ、新種の拷問じゃないかしら。ひねくれすぎてる夢じゃなくて？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe nachgedacht ... Sind wir ganz bestimmt wieder zurück? Oder könnte das eine neue Folter sein, die Tervantias ersonnen hat? Ein kranker, verzerrter Traum?"
languages.original_text: "I've been thinking... Are we definitely back? Could this be another kind of torture cooked up by Tervantias? Some twisted dream?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nachgedacht ... Sind wir ganz bestimmt wieder zurück? Oder könnte das eine neue Folter sein, die Tervantias ersonnen hat? Ein kranker, verzerrter Traum?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "I've been thinking... Are we definitely back? Could this be another kind of torture cooked up by Tervantias? Some twisted dream?"

languages.text: "Düşünüyordum da... Kesin olarak döndük mü? Bu, Tervantias kurguladığı bir tür işkence olabilir mi? Olmadı çarpık bir hayal?"
languages.original_text: "I've been thinking... Are we definitely back? Could this be another kind of torture cooked up by Tervantias? Some twisted dream?"

traits.locale_text: "Düşünüyordum da... Kesin olarak döndük mü? Bu, Tervantias tarafından yaratılmış bir çeşit işkence olabilir mi? Ya da çarpık bir hayal?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
